about_the_game:
Welcome to Bratty Bottoms! A charming visual novel with management-style game mechanics where you transform a struggling motel into a bustling success. Play as a hardworking newcomer hired to help manage the family-owned motel, run by the bratty yet endearing Lila.

Build relationships, tackle daily challenges, and improve the motel's reputation while dealing with Lila's demanding nature and making new friends, like the bubbly intern Nicole and more!

Experience an engaging story filled with humor, heart, and the satisfaction of turning a rundown business into a thriving hotspot. Your choices matter—will you earn Lila's trust and friendship, or will you struggle under her tough exterior?

✦ Unique character interactions and evolving relationships.
✦ Management-style game mechanics
✦ Customizable outfits and an in-game shop for various upgrades.
✦ A heartwarming story of growth, friendship, and transformation.
